description:
Mei is the older cousin of Yomi. She is cool, powerful and is a freelance exorcist. Mei likes calming devil spirits by herself and her weapon is a beautiful spear. She is a bit jealous of Yomi who will be the next head of Isayama family, but she does not show her true feelings to anyone. Mei`s father is Isayama Yuu.
Source: BoxAnimeManga
name: Isayama Mei
